name: PizzaTravelTime
description:
This is a game made for the Calzone Game jam

This game have much things to interact with and has some humor

The game is about a cheese wizard and a mushroom warrior that meet a tomato scientist to travel in time to prevent an anomaly to eat the whole timeline while meeting a Jam Caveman, the game involves grinding in order to progress, time travel to medieval, prehistoric and future (and a unknown era), to meet people from the past and future

Pluguins from:

Yanfly: http://www.yanfly.moe/wiki/Main_Page

SRDude: http://sumrndm.site/
